thread.title: Outstanding Customer service! Henri is the best...
thread.title_full: Outstanding Customer service! Henri is the best... - Review of Relais Hotel du Vieux Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mory C
title: Outstanding Customer service! Henri is the best...
text: I have been going to Paris on business trip for over 12 years now! It was my first time to try something different and get away from the usual international hotel brand. Great surprise- VP take you back in time in the French history with a modern touch. Above all, there is Henri. The best receptionist I have ever met in Paris usually not famous with customer service. Henri is always offering is help with a great understanding and anticipation of your needs!
